title: Virtual World 3D
description: A 3D virtual world for exploration and social interaction. Create an avatar and explore various themed environments while meeting other users. Features customizable characters, chat functionality, mini-games, and user-created content in a persistent online world.
how_to_play: Use WASD or arrow keys to move your avatar, and mouse to look around. Press Space to jump and E to interact with objects or other players. Create and customize your character, then explore different worlds and participate in activities. Chat with other users and make friends in this social virtual environment.
